statements: SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM influencers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE age < 30 AND location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 AND gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE gender='Female' AND age < 25 AND engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT id, name, location, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, followers_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT audience_id, age_group, gender FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender='male';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 100000 AND engagement_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics WHERE age_group='18-25' AND location='USA';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id IN (SELECT influencer_id FROM audience_demographics WHERE age_group='25-35');
SELECT * FROM influencer_agency WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM influencer_agency WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT influencer_name, category FROM influencer WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes_count > 500 AND comments_count > 100;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_date FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, category, followers_count FROM influencer WHERE category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM influencer_agency ORDER BY location;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_date, likes_count, comments_count FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes_count > 10000 AND comments_count > 500 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, category, followers_count FROM influencer WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM influencer_agencies;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_location FROM influencers WHERE influencer_location='New York';
SELECT audience_gender, audience_age, audience_location FROM audience_demographics WHERE influencer_id=1;
SELECT pattern_id, engagement_type, engagement_rate FROM engagement_patterns ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM influencer_agencies ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_location FROM influencers WHERE influencer_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics JOIN influencers ON audience_demographics.influencer_id = influencers.influencer_id WHERE audience_age > 25;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_type, engagement_rate FROM influencers JOIN engagement_patterns ON influencers.influencer_id = engagement_patterns.influencer_id ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Audiences WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT audience_id, age, location FROM Audiences ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT a.name AS influencer_name, b.location AS audience_location, c.impressions, c.clicks FROM Influencers a, Audiences b, Analytics c WHERE a.influencer_id = c.influencer_id AND b.audience_id = c.audience_id;
SELECT * FROM Engagements JOIN Campaigns ON Engagements.engagement_id = Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE engagement_type = 'Sponsored Post';
